General.Name: Southeast Cement Co Ltd
General.Description: Southeast Cement Corp., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of cement in Taiwan. It offers Portland I and Portland II cement, water-quenched blast furnace slag powder, Portland blast furnace cement, and southeast brand waterproof cement. The company also provides ready-mix concrete cement, land and housing products, raw materials, as well as limestone and cement processing products. It also engages in reinvestment business, as well as the development, rental, and sale of residential buildings. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
